comment: Good morning my true embodiments of perfection ! ( Don't let that voice creep in , it's true . You just need to remember . ) May this day usher you into your new Self . Whatever moments of clarity you had over the last few days , may they become solidified and actualized . <URL>

comment: You are worthy of your own self growth and self love . Remember . Remember to laugh . To cry . To exist . Remember to heal . And to learn . To release . Remember you are beautiful . Worthy . Enough .
